abstract: SRM Global, the British hedge fund that unsuccessfully sought to block a takeover of troubled British lender Northern Rock, is now taking the fight to Countrywide Financial, signaling its intention to fight the $4 billion takeover by Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: SRM Global, the British hedge fund that unsuccessfully sought to block a takeover of troubled British lender Northern Rock, is now taking the fight to Countrywide Financial, signaling its intention to fight the $4 billion takeover by Bank of America.
